question: I had a dream where someone had come and told me that my fiancé had donated money to a good cause and I was very pleased with him and happy.is this a good dream?
answer:
QUESTION
I had a dream where someone had come and told me that my fiancé had donated money to a good cause and I was very pleased with him and happy.is this a good dream?
ANSWER


Share:
At the outset, we wish to state that it is not permissible to have any relationship with a Ghayr Mahram (not prohibited in marriage) male outside of marriage.

It is possible that Shaytaan wishes to advance this illegitimate bond through such convincing dreams. Do not be deceived.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
